name: Firefox theme: Peridot [Fx 29+/Linux]
description: A bright green skin combining smooth gradients with some system-native elements, with full support for lightweight themes/Personas. Updated from style 55301 for Firefox 29 and above. Linux only; untested on Windows and macOS/OS X.

* Initial release.
